TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MediaDrmKeyType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MediaDrmKeyType Offline = int32(2)

summary.para: This key request type specifies that the keys will be for offline use, they will be saved to the device for use when the device is not connected to a network.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MediaDrmKeyType Release = int32(3)

summary.para: This key request type specifies that previously saved offline keys should be released.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MediaDrmKeyType Streaming = int32(1)

summary.para: This key request type species that the keys will be for online use, they will not be saved to the device for subsequent use when the device is not connected to a network.
